languages.text: {n}Мейв зажмуривается, сжав платье побелевшими пальцами. Раскатисто рыкнув, ласеракс подается вперед и... обогнув тщедушную фигурку, стремглав бросается прочь, навстречу свободе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Мейв зажмуривается, сжав платье побелевшими пальцами. Раскатисто рыкнув, ласеракс подается вперед и... обогнув тщедушную фигурку, стремглав бросается прочь, навстречу свободе.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive shuts her eyes tightly and clenches her whitening fingers around her dress. With a sonorous roar, the lacerax swiftly lunges forward... past Maive's frail figure and toward freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive shuts her eyes tightly and clenches her dress, her fingers gone white. With a sonorous roar, the lacerax swiftly lunges forward... past her frail figure and toward freedom.{/n}

{n}Maive shuts her eyes tightly and clenches her whitening fingers around her dress. With a sonorous roar, the lacerax swiftly lunges forward... past Maive's frail figure and toward freedom.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive schließt fest die Augen und krallt ihre Finger in ihr Kleid. Mit einem sonoren Brüllen stürmt der Lacerax nach vorne ... an der zierlichen Maive vorbei in die Freiheit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive shuts her eyes tightly and clenches her whitening fingers around her dress. With a sonorous roar, the lacerax swiftly lunges forward... past Maive's frail figure and toward freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive schließt fest die Augen und krallt ihre Finger in ihr Kleid. Mit einem sonoren Brüllen stürmt der Lacerax nach vorne ... an der zierlichen Maive vorbei in die Freiheit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive ferme les yeux en tenant les pans de sa robe dans ses mains si fermement serrées que ses phalanges blanchissent. Dans un rugissement retentissant, le lacérax bondit en avant... pour prendre la fuite, sans prêter attention à la frêle jeune femme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive shuts her eyes tightly and clenches her whitening fingers around her dress. With a sonorous roar, the lacerax swiftly lunges forward... past Maive's frail figure and toward freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive ferme les yeux en tenant les pans de sa robe dans ses mains si fermement serrées que ses phalanges blanchissent. Dans un rugissement retentissant, le lacérax bondit en avant... pour prendre la fuite, sans prêter attention à la frêle jeune femme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}梅芙紧紧闭上了眼睛，发白的手指捂住了自己的脖子。异虎发出了响亮的咆哮，转眼间就扑了过去……它绕开了梅芙孱弱的身体，朝自由的方向奔去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive shuts her eyes tightly and clenches her whitening fingers around her dress. With a sonorous roar, the lacerax swiftly lunges forward... past Maive's frail figure and toward freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙紧紧闭上了眼睛，发白的手指捂住了自己的脖子。异虎发出了响亮的咆哮，转眼间就扑了过去……它绕开了梅芙孱弱的身体，朝自由的方向奔去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive cierra los ojos con fuerza y aferra su vestido con sus dedos pálidos. Con un sonoro rugido, el lacerax se abalanza hacia delante... ignorando la frágil figura de Maive, hacia la libertad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive shuts her eyes tightly and clenches her whitening fingers around her dress. With a sonorous roar, the lacerax swiftly lunges forward... past Maive's frail figure and toward freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive cierra los ojos con fuerza y aferra su vestido con sus dedos pálidos. Con un sonoro rugido, el lacerax se abalanza hacia delante... ignorando la frágil figura de Maive, hacia la libertad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}メイヴは目をぎゅっと閉じ、こわばった白い指でドレスを強く握りしめた。轟音とともに、ラセラックスが素早く突進する…メイヴのか弱い姿をかすめて、自由へと向かっていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive shuts her eyes tightly and clenches her whitening fingers around her dress. With a sonorous roar, the lacerax swiftly lunges forward... past Maive's frail figure and toward freedom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは目をぎゅっと閉じ、こわばった白い指でドレスを強く握りしめた。轟音とともに、ラセラックスが素早く突進する…メイヴのか弱い姿をかすめて、自由へと向かっていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive, gözlerini sıkıca yumup bembeyaz kesilen parmaklarıyla elbisesini sıkıyor. Gür bir şekilde kükreyen laseraks, hızla ileri atılıyor... Narin Maive'in yanından geçip özgürlüğe koşuyor.{/n}
